body_html:
another thing I found is that, if I modified the training code, so that it won't go through all batches, let say, only train 50 batches

if i >= 50:
    break

then the deadlock seems to disappear.
body_text:
another thing I found is that, if I modified the training code, so that it won't go through all batches, let say, only train 50 batches
if i >= 50:
    break

then the deadlock seems to disappear.
body:
another thing I found is that, if I modified the training code, so that it won't go through all batches, let say, only train 50 batches

```
if i >= 50:
    break
```

then the deadlock seems to disappear.
